meanings.definition: To interlace or intertwine branches or vines to form a hedge or fence.
meanings.sent1: She pleaches the branches together to create a natural fence.
meanings.sent2: The gardener pleaches the vines to make a beautiful hedge.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to pleaches the branches into a cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity pleaches nature and art into a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent5: The way she pleaches the branches is like weaving a living tapestry.

meanings.definition: A hedge or fence made by pleaching.
meanings.sent1: The pleaches in the garden provide privacy and beauty.
meanings.sent2: We admired the intricate design of the pleaches along the path.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat likes to hide behind the pleaches and surprise us.
meanings.sent4: The pleaches stand tall like guardians of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight filters through the pleaches, creating a dappled pattern on the ground.
